installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

if [ ! -f "/mnt/server/ioq3ded" ]; then
    apt update
    apt install -y ioquake3-server
    cp -r /usr/lib/ioquake3/* /mnt/server/
fi

if [ ! -d /mnt/server/.egg-install ]; then
    mkdir -p /mnt/server/.egg-install
fi

cd /mnt/server/.egg-install

if [ ! -f "quake3-1.32-assets.zip" ]; then
    echo "Downloading Q3A assets archive"
    curl -sSL "https://drive.usercontent.google.com/download?id=1ZQQZv4PT6yuSAQ5zoEgOen-sPKW9lCy2&confirm=y" -o "quake3-1.32-assets.zip"
fi
echo "Extracting Q3A assets"
unzip -q -o "quake3-1.32-assets.zip" -d "/mnt/server/"

if [ ! -f "osp-Quake3-1.03a_full.zip" ]; then
    echo "Downloading Q3A OSP mod"
    curl -sSL "https://drive.usercontent.google.com/download?id=1RrHzS_FpERtNDYxqflnijlT9gbmsEH5U&confirm=y" -o "osp-Quake3-1.03a_full.zip"
fi
echo "Extracting OSP mod"
unzip -q -o "osp-Quake3-1.03a_full.zip" -d "/mnt/server/"

if [ ! -d /mnt/server/.egg-install/zeropingheroes/game-servers ]; then
    echo "Downloading configs"
    mkdir -p /mnt/server/.egg-install/zeropingheroes/
    cd /mnt/server/.egg-install/zeropingheroes/
    git clone https://github.com/zeropingheroes/game-servers.git
fi
echo "Copying configs"
cp -r /mnt/server/.egg-install/zeropingheroes/game-servers/linux/QuakeIIIArena/configs/* /mnt/server/

echo "Install complete"
echo "To force a full reinstall, delete the .egg-install directory"
